title: Week 16 Reminder
message: Don't forget league night this Thursday, November 20th at 7:00 PM. See you at Brunswick Lanes!

title: Holiday Tournament Registration Open
message: Sign up for our annual Holiday Tournament on December 11th! Prizes for 1st, 2nd, and 3rd place. Contact your team captain to register.

title: Playoff Picture Heating Up
message: With only 17 weeks remaining, the race for playoff spots is getting intense! Top 8 teams advance. Check the standings and playoff bracket to see where your team stands.

title: Lane Assignments Posted
message: Lane assignments for Week 16 have been posted. Check the schedule section for your team's lane assignment.
